website_summaries.verdict: This highly rated beekeeper's hat and veil combine protection with all-day comfort and wearability, which is incorporated into a unisex design.
pros: Well-constructed with a large brim, but not too large to be distracting or obtrusive
Polycotton veil is easy to see through
Elastic under arms keeps veil down and keeps bees from getting into clothing
Users have found this a great alternative to wearing a full suit
cons: Mesh in the veil is very fine, so it can be difficult to see through it in darker conditions

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly well constructed for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Well constructed. If you're tackling a bee problem or are working with bees and honey making, this is worth the money. The hat is nice and large with a decent sized brim but not too large. Will fit a variety of sizes of bodies. Delivery was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Lindley Karstens

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bee veil so I don't have anything to compare it to but it definitely does the job. There are elastic loops to put your arms through and that keeps it tight all the way around which completely prevents bees from sneaking in. I have two of these now and plan on ordering a couple more for when I'm showing multiple people the inside of a hive.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: It great!  5 star fits big heads
customer_reviews.text: I love it five stars all the way I was worried about the size but it truly does fit all I have a big head literally and it fits me very comfortably. Definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.author: T.G Simmons in the House! Hey hey

customer_reviews.title: Great screen but a loose fitting hat
customer_reviews.text: The black screen makes it very easy to see what you’re working on and it band keeps the screen off your skin. I have another with a light colored screen and the sun makes it very hard to see through the reflection. My only criticism, the hat falls off your head when looking down.
customer_reviews.author: MikeS

customer_reviews.title: Good hat thickness but the screen is cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Good thickness on hat part but disappointed on the screen, like nylon baby screen or that cheap nets you get kids to catch frogs. A little worried if a Hornet goes to the face if this will stop him or will he push the flimsy fabric in and still sting.....
customer_reviews.author: R K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: At my job I do beekeeping and can say with confidence that this definitely holds up nicely. While a majority of the time I don’t feel a need to wear this it is very convenient to have on hand. Unlike other veils this stays on my head perfectly. If you’re a beginner beekeeper this is not only a smart purchase but a must.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C

customer_reviews.title: I really like this design - provides maximum face protection without the ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this design - provides maximum face protection without the hassle of a full suit. Easy to put on.. and the "seal" seems quite secure.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Loveland

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight facial protection
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, cool, effective. Nice inbetween item when I dont need a lot of protection but would not want to deal with bees around my face. Now, when they add that Varroa laser blaster...
customer_reviews.author: Paul Christu

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I liked the small size. Just something to cover head and face. Comes in handy bush hogging when you run over a yellow jacket nest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Steel ring at edge of hat and bottom of mesh holds mesh away from face. At least for me, hat fit snugly and stays in place. This is good since I will be in an awkward position going after a wasp nest.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Tougher then You may think
customer_reviews.text: Light-weight, comfortable, and it lasted. I only expected this to last a year. Was I wrong. I did not just use it for bees, I used it for all bug removal.
customer_reviews.author: Javelin SST72

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, not hot , good protection, good visibility ,easy to put on
customer_reviews.author: H2

customer_reviews.title: Fits very well
customer_reviews.text: I love the hat and is a high-quality product. I am happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: susie22b

customer_reviews.title: Good product but elastic too short
customer_reviews.text: Product works good but the elastic is too short which makes the back of the veil ride up. Going to make some modifications to it myself so it will work right. Its a great idea, just he elastic is too short.
customer_reviews.author: Survivor

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.text: My husband used this hood to repair a wall in which wasps had built a nest. Obviously, he had to cover up the rest of his body with other clothes, but this hood kept the wasps away from his face and allowed him to see what he was doing. Would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R. Steidley

customer_reviews.title: It protects against wasp and bees!
customer_reviews.text: I like the protection and the ease of putting it on and taking it off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Fortunately, I haven't had to use it for actual bees, just a Halloween costume.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Nice and large. Only minor issue is that the mess in the viewing area is rather fine (which I guess it has to be) and therefore if you're trying to exterminate wasps (which is better done at dusk), it makes the world a bit dark. So grab a flashlite.
customer_reviews.author: Scott E. Wrangham

customer_reviews.title: works for mosquitos as well
customer_reviews.text: I used it for keeping mosquitos off my face while gardening. works fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: cindy segent

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than the jacket but just as efficient. For ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than the jacket but just as efficient. For people with broad shoulders this product may leave a gap between your shoulder blades where bees can enter but hasn't been a problem yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great veil to have in your vehicle or just use ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great veil to have in your vehicle or just use it all the time. I have been using this veil instead of my suit.
customer_reviews.author: David Baker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its the best thing Ihave tried to keep the bees away from my face while working outside.
customer_reviews.author: Betty R Woods

customer_reviews.title: but since I'm the opposite the smaller size meant a better fit.
customer_reviews.text: What an improvement from the old jungle helmet and metal screen which I replaced. Lightweight and quick to put on. I could believe it being small for a hefty person, but since I'm the opposite the smaller size meant a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: This hat is well made, fits great.
customer_reviews.text: This hat works great, no bees on the inside with me. It arrived in time and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: needs an extra inch or so of the elastic
customer_reviews.text: the elastic is too small to be effective..it rides up your back give the skimping on the elastic
customer_reviews.author: richard Kivler

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This hat seems to be well made. The screen mesh is easy to see through. We are happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: So-Win

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to see through while working with bees!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Stinnett

customer_reviews.title: Good quality veil at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be of good quality. I have used the veil twice to check on my bees and have not had any of them get inside of it, so I would say it works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works so far..had to cut the little sleeve straps as they didn't fit my body
customer_reviews.author: lowrider06

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like easy to use and kipping bee away from my face.
customer_reviews.author: German E

customer_reviews.title: Head ban keeps hat nice and snug so it doesn't rock and roll on ...
customer_reviews.text: Still new, but seems to be quality made. Head ban keeps hat nice and snug so it doesn't rock and roll on your head.
customer_reviews.author: Sunsetfigs

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works well for greenhead fly protection. . I do wish it was a bit bigger radius, but the flies haven’t bitten me through it yet. Also hard to wash.
customer_reviews.author: David NJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So happy my husband can go outside and not worry about bees buzzing around.
customer_reviews.author: Texasgal

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it.
customer_reviews.text: This product would have barely fit a toddler had holes in it and the material was very flimsy. Very disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: Magan

customer_reviews.title: Great bee hat
customer_reviews.text: Great bee hat. No strings to attach. Just pull over your head and put your arms through the holes. Bought one for myself and two for my friends.
customer_reviews.author: David Putnam

customer_reviews.title: works great, good price
customer_reviews.text: works great, good price, recommend it for anyone needing just a veil
customer_reviews.author: Publius1981

customer_reviews.title: Bummble Bee Veil.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to get into with a very good view.
customer_reviews.author: Lilianaforaday

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, exactly as advertised. Good value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift for my wife. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Hesington

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: I am a bee keeper and it get hot when putting in swarm this hat and veil was a lot lighter therefore I stayed cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my mug, I wear 7 1/2 or 7 5/8 depending on the maker and this fits really well.
customer_reviews.author: Bigman8u4lunch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great hat! Probably cheaper out there but for a quick buy it didn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for tending the hive. Will suit up when collecting.
customer_reviews.author: DZM

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Quality material, but a bit snug for this bowling ball head.
customer_reviews.author: Sheileagh Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, my only complaint is that it's a bit snug on the head, and I don't have a huge head. So I'm hoping it stretches out a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good. Fits well easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Foil

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Okay for a beekeeping hat, stays on my head good and keeps the bees out.
customer_reviews.author: Linea S Speer

customer_reviews.title: really good
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beekeepers hat. Much better than the cheap ones the boss originally had for us.
customer_reviews.author: dennis leininger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came fast and the quality was beyond what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for my husband (big head) and me (small head).
customer_reviews.author: Jcollard

customer_reviews.title: We tried it out and it worked well. The ...
customer_reviews.text: We tried it out and it worked well. The bees or wasps did not bother us. We had on long sleeves and gloves toom
customer_reviews.author: Kateena Runge

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for me, good value
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 6 foot 250lb male and I wear this with a disposable paint suit and my protection. I do use the suit hood too. The veil could use a little longer elastic but that's easily fixed. Otherwise it's fine and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: K.T. Portland

product_meta.title: Humble Bee 210 Polycotton Beekeeping Veil with Round Hat
product_meta.description: Size:StandardProfessional-grade beekeeping veil. Designed for comfort. Built to last. Humble Bee round beekeeping veils are constructed from a premium 50% cotton / 50% synthetic blend. We raised the bar on quality by integrating a soft hat and employing reinforced top and bottom brims. We also added an oversized mesh to protect your neck and shoulders, plus elastic shoulder straps to keep the veil perfectly in place. You're safe with extra strength, best-in-class protection against bee stingsHumble Bee beekeeping veils utilize medium-weight (260 gsm) cloth, woven in a special interlocking pattern, that provides superior protection against bee stings. At the same time, the lithe, breathable fabric helps keep you cool during the warm summer beekeeping season. With Humble Bee, say goodbye to painful bee stings and hello to extra strength protection and all-day comfort! Universal fit for all male and female body typesHumble Bee round beekeeping veils come in one-size that fits all. Your purchase makes a difference. Humble Bee donates 10% of earnings to charity. Humble Bee is committed to helping local beekeepers and protecting bees around the world. That's why we donate 10% of our net profits to not-for-profit organizations that encourage local beekeeping activities and promote bee conservation efforts. Together, we can strengthen bee populations and ensure the art of beekeeping is passed on to future generations.
feature_bullets: Polycotton beekeeper veil with round hat, reinforced brims, and elastic shoulder straps
Medium-weight 50% cotton / 50% synthetic blend (260 gsm) provides outstanding protection against bee stings, plus all-day comfort in most weather conditions
Universal fit with an oversized mesh to protect your neck and shoulders, plus elastic shoulder straps to keep everything comfortably in place
Unisex design for men and women
Humble Bee donates 10% of earnings to not-for-profit organizations that encourage local beekeeping activities and promote bee conservation efforts

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars151 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
